reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and appreciate its thick, soft material, with one noting it's not scratchy. The dress receives positive feedback for its appearance, with one customer mentioning it compliments from all angles, and another noting it looks expensive. However, the sizing and length receive mixed reviews - while some find it fits well, others say it's too small, and while some like the length, others find it too short in front. items.body: I love this dress! The hem is the perfect length all around but it is too tight across the shoulders and bust. I purchased a 3xl and normally wear a 3xl. Read more
items.author: VERONIQUE GETTIS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality and color
items.body: This women's blouse is a charming blend of elegance and ease. Crafted from a silky, breathable fabric, it feels light on the skin and offers just enough structure to make it perfect for both work and weekends. The tailored cut flatters the figure without being too snug, and the subtle details‚Äîlike delicate buttons or a soft ruffle‚Äîadd a touch of feminine flair. üëö Key Features: - Fit: Relaxed yet stylish; allows for easy movement - Style: Great for layering or wearing solo, transitions from day to night - Fabric: Soft, wrinkle-resistant, and holds up well after washing - Versatility: Pairs beautifully with jeans, trousers, or a skirt Read more
items.author: Greidy Rojas

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs small, shorter than pictured
items.body: I‚Äôm so on the fence about this dress. First of all, it‚Äôs a lot shorter than I expected. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô6‚Äù and the lowest button is about halfway down my jean zipper (so above the crotch). I was planning on wearing it with leggings anyways so not a total deal breaker but was looking for it to be a tad longer. The pockets are also placed pretty high. They‚Äôre in the front and are right at waist level. I don‚Äôt like the way the dress looks without a belt, not flattering at all for my figure but with the belt the pockets are kind of tucked under it a bit and draw attention to my lower belly area a bit which is NOT a place I want to accentuate. I weigh about 190 and usually wear a size 12 or a large but I‚Äôm also a 38D so a little wide in the back and pretty busty. I bought an XL and I could‚Äôve even gone bigger. It‚Äôs not tight in the back but the chest pulls a bit. I like it better open with a cami under it so again, that‚Äôs ok. The material is pretty thick, but not very soft. Might get better with washing but I don‚Äôt know if I‚Äôd dry this, it might shrink too much. I‚Äôll probably get some gf opinions on it and then decide if it should go back or not. Read more
items.author: Loves_2_read

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your new favorite dress is right here!!
items.body: Safe to say I'm obsessed now. I have the green and the red buffalo plaids, and the pink. I absolutely LOVE these dresses; they are just the right weight for fall into winter. I've worn both a couple of times now, and received lots of compliments from across the board each time. I wear them with opaque black tights and knee boots, and add a belt to visually cinch the middle a little bit, but it looks great even without a belt. And they have POCKETS!! I had gotten the green initially in a size M, which fit great at my waist but, as I expected, a little too snug in the bust. I wear this one with a tank or cami underneath and leave the first several buttons undone. I then ordered the red in a size L, that one I was able to button with no pulling at the bust. I also ordered the pink in L, but this one is snug in the bust area too, so I wear with a cami. I am having a hard time resisting another color. For reference. I am 40/35/41, 5'3.5", 160 lbs. The front center of the hi-lo hem hits about 2" above my knees, so I'd wear tights, and imagine taller people would as well if wearing as a dress, which the long side and back hems allow you to do. If you're busty, size up. Cute, comfortable, fun to wear, flattering. Get one! Read more
items.author: "L"

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it
items.body: This dress is absolutely gorgeous I love the design of the dress and it‚Äôs warm enough and very comfortable Read more
items.author: Robert negron sr

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress - unusable pockets
items.body: I like this dress a lot. The material is thick and it hangs well. I am 5'8" 180lbs 34G. I bought the XL and am glad I did for the fit in the shoulders and bust, but waist wise I probably could have gone with a Large. I wear it with a belt and I like the look. For me, it's too short in front to wear without leggings/tights, but with leggings it is a great fall outfit. The blue is really rich. I am taking off a star because the sleeves are a little short (I wear them rolled up) and because the pockets are useless. They're tiny and in the front, just at the height where I wear a belt, so they're basically un-usable. I love a dress with pockets, and it's one of the reasons I bought this one, so I was disappointed that I can't put my hand sin them or use them to carry things. I'm considering trying to alter the dress to add some pockets on the side seam. All in all, cute dress but if you're looking for a dress where you can put your hands in the pockets, this isn't the one. Read more
items.author: ximena

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Blue White, Butterflywhite, Blackish Green, Deep Green, Blue, Nred, Peacockgreen, Butterflyblue, Black, Ngreen, Light Blue, Red, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
